DOC.brief_summary: To conduct quantitative survey measure knowledge Human papillomavirus ( HPV ) cervical cancer , HPV vaccine acceptability among parent rural adolescent girl Mysore District , India . Hypothesis : General knowledge attitudes severity treat ability cancer predict acceptability HPV vaccination among parent rural adolescent girl Mysore , India .
DOC.brief_title: Survey Predictors Human Papillomavirus ( HPV ) Vaccination Among Parents Rural Adolescent Girls Mysore , India
DOC.criteria: 18 year age parent adolescent girl ( 10 15 year age ) able speak English Kannada willing undergo inform consent process Does capacity undergo inform consent process
